series.title: Smitten
series.description:
Smitten is the HOT new romance series for teens.
    
    Smitten girls are strong, gorgeous and confident, following their dreams around the world. They are solving their own problems, not waiting around for a knight on a white horse. Although sometimes that would be nice …
    
    Smitten boys are charming, suave and deeply sexy. They’re the perfect boy to fall in love with. They won’t sparkle in the sun, or sprout wings, but they will sweep you off your feet and their kisses will have you weak at the knees.
